website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede is arguably the most popular Puma sneaker in existence. Equipped with the shoe’s rich history, the Puma Suede Emboss Iced Fluo is an icon with a bold update. If you are looking for a fun and eye-catching pair to add to your classic collection then this release is for you. Available at an affordable price, this shoe is worth the try for sneaker fans with a daring taste.
pros: An overwhelming majority of reviewers mentioned that the shoe is very comfortable
Some even added that they wear it to work all day and their feet didn’t hurt
A significant number of buyers applauded the shoe’s unique yet classic style
The shoe is available at an affordable price, which prompted consumers to regard the shoe to have a good value for money
The construction and materials are of good quality, according to some buyers
Few long-time fans appreciate the retro look of the shoe and the nostalgic element that the shoe embodies
A couple of purchasers especially loved the eye-catching colors of the shoe
The Puma Suede Emboss Iced Fluo comes in 3 bold colorways
A number of shoe users commended the eye-catching colors of the shoe as it adds style to their overall look
A few of the reviewers shared that they got complimented a lot every time they wear it out
cons: A substantial number of wearers disclosed that the shoe is a little bit narrow in the toebox area
Some commenters mentioned that the shoe does not have enough arch support
A handful of shoe users noticed that the Puma Suede Emboss Iced Fluo wears down pretty quickly

customer_reviews.title: Run 1/2 size larger than Puma Suede Liga...and these are such a mad lovely color....
customer_reviews.text: My hubby owns many PUma suede liga sneakers--around 8. He saw this color and we both loved it and ordered it Prime Day for the discount. However, unlike the suede PUma Liga, these ran 1/2 size or so too large. We are returning them. IF we could have gotten the discount on a replacement, we would have ordered a half-size down, but you can't transfer the Prime Day discount, sadly--and Amazon should reconsider that for clothing/shoe items where trying them on matters so much. Beautiful, gorgeous blue. Very attractive sneaks. The laces are a tad brighter than the suede part, but just totally cool sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: Nice color Nice looking wish they had it in wide.
customer_reviews.text: color is gorgeous. wish it were a little wider. its more narrow than even more shoes (just a little but enough to cause me issues) if you don't have wide feet you won't have any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and great price!😄
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. Suede is good quality and the color blocking is nice. Everything I was hoping for but better. If your looking for a gift for a teenager this is perfect (P.SWould go a size down)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these pumas , the color, the style my 4th pair of pumas but not my last

customer_reviews.title: While I do love them, and they're wonderfully comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for work. While I do love them, and they're wonderfully comfortable, I've had them less than three months, and the inner wall of the right shoe has torn away from the sole. I don't work in a harsh environment, so this is a very unfortunate issue. I expect better from Puma.
customer_reviews.author: Steffan David

customer_reviews.text: I own 15 different pair of Puma Suede. These seem a bit narrower than the others. They also didn't come with the two pair of fat laces all the others did. They still look fly af though!

customer_reviews.title: FLAT AS A BOARD
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe. Inside is flate as a board, and its uncomfortable. Bottom of shoe is also flat, shoe has no arch. Packaged and ready for return.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Suede Emboss ICED Fluo-M Suede Emboss Iced Fluo-m
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all puma shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the success of the German sports brand. As part of every street community from the 80's on, the suede has even been involved in historical matters on a global scale. The suede classic emboss features an embossed form stripe with added splatter graphic to the midsole.
feature_bullets: Monochrome lace-up fashion sneaker featuring PUMA Formstrip at side and logo at tongue
